timeline.bodyText: Why not entity like the other constructors?
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,8 +3,23 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2824 net/minecraft/network/packet/c2s/play/PlayerInter
 	FIELD field_12870 entityId I
 	FIELD field_12871 type Lnet/minecraft/class_2824$class_2825;
 	FIELD field_12872 hitPos Lnet/minecraft/class_243;
+	FIELD field_25660 playerSneaking Z
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_1268;Lnet/minecraft/class_243;Z)V
+		ARG 1 entity
+		ARG 2 hand
+		ARG 3 hitPos
+		ARG 4 playerSneaking
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_1268;Z)V
+		ARG 1 entity
+		ARG 2 hand
+		ARG 3 playerSneaking
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Z)V
+		ARG 1 target

replies.bodyText: probably because there are two entities, the player and the interacted entity
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
Because there is 3 constructors and the type of the interaction differs from the constructor.
example: first constuctor is for ATTACK (therefore "target"), second and third are INTERACT and INTERACT_AT respectively
replies.author: DreenDex

timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,5 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2855 net/minecraft/network/packet/c2s/play/RenameItemC2SPacket
 	FIELD field_13013 itemName Ljava/lang/String;
+	METHOD <init> (Ljava/lang/String;)V
+		ARG 1 name

replies.bodyText: Imo the field itemName should be name
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: @DreenDex just resolve this one and I will approve
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Do i need to rename getItemName to getName? This looks strange to me, and also can broke some things if mojang will decide to add getName method to packets 🙄
replies.author: DreenDex

replies.bodyText: They won't add deobfuscated getName methods or even an obfuscated one. Fabric uses intermediary names fyi, feel free to look at fabric wiki for more info. Just rename that method to getName
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: You could have done the last parameter at the same time :)
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,6 +11,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2853 net/minecraft/network/packet/c2s/play/RecipeBookD
 	FIELD field_17206 smokerGuiFilteringCraftable Z
 	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1860;)V
 		ARG 1 recipe
+	METHOD <init> (ZZZZZZ)V
+		ARG 1 guiOpen
+		ARG 2 filteringCraftable
+		ARG 3 furnaceGuiOpen
+		ARG 4 furnaceFilteringCraftable
+		ARG 5 blastFurnaceGuiOpen

replies.bodyText:
That last parameter used to set 2 fields of the packet (blastFurnaceFilteringCraftable, smokerGuiFilteringCraftable) and they are being send separately. Weird flex, but ok. I don't have any good names on my mind.
Only one stuff unites both entity blocks: they are used to smelt 2 times faster. 😕
replies.author: DreenDex

replies.bodyText: then cookingFilteringCraftable I think if that applies to blast furnace, furnace, and that 4 log one furnace food smelter
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: @liach Furnace is specified with furnaceFilteringCraftable as can be seen in ARG 4, but cookingFilteringCraftable is better than nothing.
replies.author: DreenDex

replies.bodyText: Please rename arg 5 as well to match arg 6 ;)
replies.author: YanisBft

timeline.message: Rename itemName to name in RenameItemC2SPacket
Rename missed parameter blastFurnaceGuiOpen to cookingGuiOpen
